Articles.Content:
Hi, so I'm a newbie to KSP but i believe i know how to install mods-

 

Steam recently made me update KSP to the latest, and now my mods aren't showing on the side of my screen when in flight.

Gamedata folder: https://gyazo.com/3dc6e6212b395561edde430fe69cd0c9

Flight:https://gyazo.com/a96b1566699c1ca1d6922a7c2b8118e4

Am I doing something wrong? Do I need to Install Mods differently?
Thanks!

For BD Armory and Mech Jeb you need a part on your craft. You can find Mech Jeb's part in command and control tab. For BD Armory I don't know where the part is. The rest of them aren't supposed to show in flight I think. Hope it helps.
